displayName.description: The display name of the web application firewall rule set version.
displayName.purpose: Provides user-friendly names for rule set versions (e.g., 'OWASP Core Rule Set 3.2' instead of just '3.2')

paranoiaLevel.description: The paranoia level of the web application firewall rule.
paranoiaLevel.purpose: Defines how aggressive the WAF rule enforcement is (1=basic, 4=most restrictive)

backward_compatibility.reason: Both fields are optional and not in required arrays
backward_compatibility.impact: No breaking changes to existing implementations
